name: Neurorunner
description:
Rescue damaged neurobrain robot from the planet finished mission. 
Collect bonuses to restore drying pixels while you running through the level.

WARNING:
"Impossible" level can cause an epileptic seizure.

Controls:
WASD - moving

Shift - lose all speed, but move as human and restore full pixels.

Space - jump


List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission
Music by Kevin MacLeod

Impact sound 

Landscape materials and rock material from Quixel Megascan
